channel.title: Run server & Compile
channel.description:
Hey. I'm trying to change the run server.exe and the compile.exe so it will work. I cannot upgrade Java because of my computer is being funny.
@echo off title Run-Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps\dep.exe;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/runner.bat;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server exit
Now, my java is. "1.6.0_29" and the path is "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exeC:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe"

item.title: Run server & Compile
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try this for run.bat

@echo off title Run-Server "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps\dep.exe;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/runner.bat;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Run server & Compile
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

What do you mean for the Google?

  1. Upgrade your Java versions.
  2. Tweak your Enviromental Variables.

item.title: Run server & Compile
item.dc:creator: @Top_Glitch Top Glitch
item.description:
@Top_Glitch wrote:

Assuming that is for the run server? Still not working, same error as last time.

item.title: Run server & Compile
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Use this:

@echo off
title Runescape F2P remake
cd bin
java -Xmx500M -cp .; server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Run server & Compile
item.dc:creator: @Top_Glitch Top Glitch
item.description:
@Top_Glitch wrote:

Doesn’t work.
Server

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Compiler

C:\Documents and Settings\Kane.KANE-7404484F3D\Desktop\Respawn-PK Final Version
Resapwnpk source>echo off
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Run server & Compile
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Top Glitch, post:1, topic:428987”]Hey. I’m trying to change the run server.exe and the compile.exe so it will work. I cannot upgrade Java because of my computer is being funny.

[quote]@echo off
title Run-Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps\dep.exe;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/runner.bat;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
exit[/quote]

Now, my java is. “1.6.0_29” and the path is “C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exeC:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe”[/quote]

for run server use this:

@echo off title Runescape F2P remake cd bin java -Xmx500M server pause

and for compiler:

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_16/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./*.java pause

change to whatever java version you have. Please read this section stickied topics first there’s a lot of info about compilers.

Read full topic
